author: Gnosis
title: Gnosis Safe
shortDescription: The Gnosis Safe is a multi-signature smart contract wallet that allows users to define a list of owner/signer accounts and a threshold number of signers required to confirm a transaction.
description: The Gnosis Safe is a multi-signature smart contract wallet that allows users to define a list of owner/signer accounts and a threshold number of signers required to confirm a transaction.

author: Multisender
title: Multisender
shortDescription: This dApp allows users to efficiently send thousands of tokens to multiple addresses by batching the transfers and automating the process. This tool enables users to save time by automatically generating transactions using MetaMask or other smart wallet software. Multisender is also completely safe in terms of account security since private keys and other sensitive data are all handled by the user's wallet software.
description: This dApp allows users to efficiently send thousands of tokens to multiple addresses by batching the transfers and automating the process. This tool enables users to save time by automatically generating transactions using MetaMask or other smart wallet software. Multisender is also completely safe in terms of account security since private keys and other sensitive data are all handled by the user's wallet software.

author: Symmetric
title: Symmetric
shortDescription: Symmetric is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) and a Decentralized Exchange (DEX), running on the Gnosis network.
description: Symmetric is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) and a Decentralized Exchange (DEX), running on the Gnosis network.

author: xDai Bridge
title: xDai Bridge
shortDescription: xDai Bridge is the official bridge dedicated to transferring Dai from Ethereum into xDai on Gnosis Chain.
description: xDai Bridge is the official bridge dedicated to transferring Dai from Ethereum into xDai on Gnosis Chain.

author: Omni Bridge
title: Omni Bridge
shortDescription: Omni Bridge is the official multitoken bridge of Gnosis Chain.
description: Omni Bridge is the official multitoken bridge of Gnosis Chain.

author: Curve
title: Curve
shortDescription: Creating deep on-chain liquidity using advanced bonding curves

author: HoneySwap
title: HoneySwap
shortDescription: HoneySwap Exchange is a decentralised exchange deployed on the xDai chain.

title: BaoSwap

author: PoolTogether
title: PoolTogether
shortDescription: PoolTogether is a prize savings protocol, enabling you to win by saving.

author: Swapr
title: Swapr
shortDescription: A governance-enabled automated market maker with adjustable fees.
description: A governance-enabled automated market maker with adjustable fees.

author: NiftyChess
title: NiftyChess
shortDescription: There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the universe. NiftyChess is a way to save any game of chess ever played.

author: NiftyInk
title: NiftyInk

title: Unique.One

author: Cold Truth Culture NFTs

author: Kredeum NFTs Factory
title: Kredeum NFTs Factory
shortDescription: Kredeum NFTs Factory is an Open Source project that provides an easy-to-use platform for creating and trading NFTs. It includes a Dapp NFT Wallet, a Smartcontracts Library, a WordPress Plugin, and the OpenSky Market, supporting crosschain NFTs on multiple EVM blockchains. The platform offers various customization options, including collection templating, NFT auto-trading and royalty enforcement.
description: Kredeum NFTs Factory is an Open Source project that provides an easy-to-use platform for creating and trading NFTs. It includes a Dapp NFT Wallet, a Smartcontracts Library, a WordPress Plugin, and the OpenSky Market, supporting crosschain NFTs on multiple EVM blockchains. The platform offers various customization options, including collection templating, NFT auto-trading and royalty enforcement.

author: EthicHub
title: EthicHub
shortDescription: EthicHub is a social enterprise that connects small farmers with the financing needed to work their land and sell their crops to direct markets.
description: EthicHub is a social enterprise that connects small farmers with the financing needed to work their land and sell their crops to direct markets.
